Package cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Answer
    Answer class, extends Post class.
    AnswerActivity
    AnswerActivity.
    AnswerFragment
    AnswerFragment called from AnswerActivity.
    BaseFragmentActivity
    BaseFragmentActivity simply a basic background fragment used to check if a fragment exists and if not create one.
    CachedPostManager
    CachedPostManager manages anything a user enters when they are offline.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is the main page.
    MainFragment
    MainFragment This is where the sorting on the main screen appears so the user may view by most popular or most recent.
    NewAnswerActivity
    newAnswerActivity - basic new new activity for answers simply calls a newAnswerFragment
    NewAnswerFragment
    NewAnswerFragment - Called from NewAnswerActivity sets the user to Guest and makes the takes input from the NewAnswerFragment interface.
    NewPostFragment
    This is used when a user would like to make a new post.
    NewQuestionActivity
    NewQuestionActivity - Simple code for when ever the "Ask a Question" button is pressed.
    NewQuestionFragment
    NewQuestionFragment - Called from NewQuestionACtivity - User to allow a user to input a question.
    OnlinePostManager
    OnlinePostManager - Saves users questions, answers, posts and statistics that the users post into elastic search.
    OnSwipeTouchListener
    OnSwipeTouchListener - Does the math to see if the user has swiped so that users may swipe thru all answers to a question.
    Post
    Post base class only ever really used as a parent of question and answers.
    PostAdapter
    An adaptor to return the desired view of a post, for use in a list view.
    PostController
    StackUnderflow application PostController.
    PostFragment
    This Fragment will help display all questions (Questions and Answers) When a user wants to view a question they are shown this screen.
    PostManager
    This class manages the different the posts into an array list of objects and allows functionality within that array list
    Question
    Question class, extends Post class This is where the differences between post and question can be found.
    QuestionActivity
    questionActivity - Simply calls QuestionFragment.
    QuestionFragment
    This fragment a question and display's it.
    Reply
    Reply class (utilized by Post class) This is the class that holds the information of when a user wishs to make a comment about a question or an answer.
    ReplyAdapter
    An adaptor to return the desired view of a post, for use in a list view.
    UserAttributes
    UserAttributes class (stores attributes local to machine)
    UsernameDialogFragment
    UsernameDiaglogFragment - When a user attempts to input a question or answer they will be prompted with a window asking for them for a user name that will then be saved on the device locally so that they may post with that same user name every time.
    UserProfile
    UserProfileManager allows for modification of private attributes such found in UserProfile mUsername is the username that the device has specified to author posts with.
    UserProfileManager
    UserProfileManager does exactly what the name suggests.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidParentException  
    InvalidPostTypeException
    InvalidPostTypeExepction simply a error if anything is not assigned as a question or an answer.
